EmailTemplate.description: No Solution Available to the Customer, triggered manually
EmailTemplate.name: No Solution Available
EmailTemplate.subject: No Solution Available: {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Subject}, {!Case.Reference_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact}, Based on investigation and analysis, Nokia has determined there is no viable solution for this Case, with the reported issue of: {!Case.Subject}. With the current information, analysis, and knowledge, we regrettably cannot solve this issue.
As a reminder of this Case, the Case number is {!Case.CaseNumber}â€‰for the {!Case.Type} Case, with the Product identified as {!Case.Product} reported to Nokia at {!Case.CH_ReportedDate__c}.
Should you need to follow up on this case, please use this Case Number as reference. If needed please engage your Customer Care Manager.
If you would like to view or update your case online, please click here:
Regards, Nokia Support Services
